result.eng: He looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ga: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.orig: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach air
result.html: D'amharc sé orm agus dreach brónach airHe looked at me with a sad expression.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé orm agus dreaċ brónaċ airHe looked at me with a sad expression.

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
